procedure.name: Oral Surgery
procedure.description: Authorization for oral surgical treatment and any additional procedures deemed necessary during surgery.

recommended_treatment.details: Oral surgical treatment as recommended by the dentist or dental provider.

treatment_alternatives.description: Patient has been informed of alternative treatment options and understands them.

types: Local anesthesia with nitrous oxide and oxygen

risks_and_complications: Drug reactions and medication side effects
Post-operative bleeding, oozing, infection, or bone inflammation
Bruising, swelling, or restricted mouth opening
Removal of bone during tooth extraction
Damage to adjacent teeth or restorations
Root tip fracture requiring retention or additional surgery
Sinus involvement requiring additional treatment or repair
Nerve injury resulting in temporary or permanent numbness or tingling
Poor bone healing or osteonecrosis in patients with bisphosphonate use or head and neck radiation
